content.text:
# 1990 Pilkington Glass Championships – Doubles

Larisa Savchenko-Neiland Natasha Zvereva
| runner   =  Patty Fendick Zina Garrison
| score    = 6–4, 6–3
| type     = singles doubles
| main_name = Eastbourne International
| draw     = 32
| seeds    = 8
}}
Katrina Adams and Zina Garrison were the defending champions, but competed this year with different partners.
Adams teamed up with Lori McNeil and lost in the second round to Helen Kelesi and Andrea Temesvári.
Garrison teamed up with Patty Fendick and lost in the final to Larisa Savchenko-Neiland and Natasha Zvereva. The score was 6–4, 6–3.
Seeds
Jana Novotná /  Helena Suková (second round, withdrew)
#  Gigi Fernández /  Martina Navratilova (semifinals)
#  Larisa Savchenko-Neiland /  Natasha Zvereva (champions)
#  Nicole Provis /  Elna Reinach (quarterfinals)
#  Kathy Jordan /  Elizabeth Smylie (semifinals)
#  Mary Joe Fernández /  Betsy Nagelsen (first round, withdrew)
#  Katrina Adams /  Lori McNeil (second round)
#  Patty Fendick /  Zina Garrison-Jackson (final)
}}
